sentences.english: In this peper, the cases for the calculation of the known theoretical area of graticule ladder are illustrated.
sentences.chinese: 文中給出經緯網梯形已知理論面積的算例。

sentences.english: This off-highway truck adopt 6 rod steering system.
sentences.chinese: 該礦用車輛採用六杆轉向梯形結構。

sentences.english: So an accurate and useful method is provided for designing the splitAckerrman steering linkage of double arm suspension .
sentences.chinese: 爲雙橫臂式懸架轉向梯形設計提供了精確實用的方法。

sentences.english: OK? Wow. And notice what I got here.
sentences.chinese: 這個聲明我們經常用梯形來圍繞。

sentences.english: The corotation ladder-shaped cover nut is enclasping central tube, and easy to realize rapid dismantling.
sentences.chinese: 正旋梯形螺母即抱緊中心管，實現快速聯接和密封。

sentences.english: "The building, in the form of a trapezoid concrete box, had no beams, " said Miyake.
sentences.chinese: 原建築是一個梯形混凝土箱型結構，是沒有梁的。

sentences.english: Today, my college professor asked my entire class what a trapezoid was.
sentences.chinese: 今天大學的教授問全班同學梯形是什麼玩意。

sentences.english: In addition, it does not impose any limitation on the sloped angle of the trapezoid.
sentences.chinese: 這種方法可以應用於梯形斜邊任意坡度角的情況。

sentences.english: The bushing is designed to specialized ladder-shaped trough;
sentences.chinese: 專業的不定期梯形槽設計襯套。

sentences.english: This is for my use of a trapezoidal method of numerical integration procedures.
sentences.chinese: 這是我編的一個利用梯形法數值計算積分的程序。

sentences.english: The design project and the PLC program flow chart waere also presented.
sentences.chinese: 給出了設計方案和PLC程序梯形圖。

sentences.english: It mounts inside a pipe or at the bottom of a rectangular, trapezoid or egg-shaped channel.
sentences.chinese: 它內部管道或在一個矩形，梯形或蛋型通道底部坐騎。

sentences.english: The method of simulation uses the trapezoidal rule and nodal method.
sentences.chinese: 電力電子主電路與電機的仿真模型均基於梯形積分法。

sentences.english: Electromagnetic flowmeter adopting three-value trapezoidal waveform exciting mode is proposed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 提出了採用三值梯形波勵磁方式的電磁流量計設計。

sentences.english: This paper presents the' optimum design model ofthe steering trapezium mechanism of heavy-duty truck.
sentences.chinese: 本文給出了轉向梯形機構優化設計的數學模型。

sentences.english: The corresponding ladder diagram is designed and the control program is accomplished.
sentences.chinese: 設計了PLC控制梯形圖，編制了相應的控制程序。
